about_the_game:
Having trouble finding good tiles for your modern setting? Build a super city with this modern tileset!

Includes:

Ground tiles: Water, green/toxic water, improved grass, sand, concrete, asphalt, dirt, two types of stone, several green ground covers for variety, fences, broken ground, wildflowers and more! Also includes plenty of road stripes.

Walls/roofs: Tons of wall types in stucco, log cabin, metal building, wood planks, stone of lots of kinds. 10+ wall types (not including color variations). You also get clay tile roof, wood plank roof, metal, three types of shingles, and 10 types of walkable roofs.

Shingle and metal roofs include shadow side tiles. Also includes peaked roof tiles you can overlay to bring a lot more variety to your roofing.

Wall tiles also include autotile windows in multiple colors.

Make lots of roads:

signage
road stripes
traffic lights
guard station
manhole covers and other details
guard rails
barricades
and more!

Lots of suburban details:

chain link fence
stone arch
picnic tables
fountain
playground equipment (swings, seesaw, whole playground units)
kids toys
statues
and more!

Make some areas “under construction”:

various tools and toolboxes
electronic direction sign
propane tanks
barricades
generator
stacks of materials
crane
steamroller
cement mixer
dump trunk
and more!

And details to make your downtown areas lively:

trash and dumpsters
graffiti
adjustable storefronts
canopies and awnings
seating
lighting
trees
ice machine, gumball machine, vending machine, etc
more windows, some with merchandise
plus custom edge tiles to make more natural paths!

Events and Animations

13 animated doors!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
detailed_description:
Having trouble finding good tiles for your modern setting? Build a super city with this modern tileset!

Includes:

Ground tiles: Water, green/toxic water, improved grass, sand, concrete, asphalt, dirt, two types of stone, several green ground covers for variety, fences, broken ground, wildflowers and more! Also includes plenty of road stripes.

Walls/roofs: Tons of wall types in stucco, log cabin, metal building, wood planks, stone of lots of kinds. 10+ wall types (not including color variations). You also get clay tile roof, wood plank roof, metal, three types of shingles, and 10 types of walkable roofs.

Shingle and metal roofs include shadow side tiles. Also includes peaked roof tiles you can overlay to bring a lot more variety to your roofing.

Wall tiles also include autotile windows in multiple colors.
